total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the unique number that is present in every row of the input grid.
Q2: Check if this unique number is present in a column that is entirely filled with this number.
Q3: If the conditions in Q1 and Q2 are met, output this unique number as a single element in the output grid.
